logical_fallacies.quote: Shut up... YOUR SCIENCE IS FAKE. ... i doing this to destroy science
logical_fallacies.correction: Expressing anger or a desire to destroy something doesn't invalidate or validate scientific principles. Claims should be supported by evidence and logical reasoning, not emotional outbursts.

logical_fallacies.quote: there is no any speed of light. nor movement...
logical_fallacies.correction: The speed of light is a well-established and experimentally verified physical constant.  Movement is a directly observable phenomenon.  Denying these requires extraordinary evidence to the contrary, which is not provided.

logical_fallacies.quote: science which reside on E=mc2 Lorentz Transformations, meter, GPS everything will be destroyed.
logical_fallacies.correction: This misrepresents the entirety of science as solely dependent on a few concepts. Even if those specific concepts were somehow invalidated, it wouldn't destroy all of science. Science is a vast and diverse field with many independent lines of inquiry.
